thread.title: Psst: I Found a Secret SkinCeuticals Sale on the Brand's Most Coveted Products (Yep, Including the C E Ferulic Serum)
thread.title_full: Psst: I Found a Secret SkinCeuticals Sale on the Brand's Most Coveted Products (Yep, Including the C E Ferulic Serum)

author: Destinee Scott
title: Psst: I Found a Secret SkinCeuticals Sale on the Brand's Most Coveted Products (Yep, Including the C E Ferulic Serum)
text:
When it comes to skincare, you usually get what you pay for. Which is why, all too often, some of the most raved-about products are also among the priciest. Case in point: the oh-so-coveted line of products from SkinCeuticals. Plenty of buyers, including PureWow Wellness Director Sarah Stiefvater, swear by the brand's offerings, from the A.G.E. Interrupter Advanced anti-wrinkle cream ($185; $157) (which she reviewed) to the cult-favorite SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic serum ($182; $155). They certainly cost a pretty penny, so I always wait for a (rare) SkinCeuticals sale to stock up for the season. Fortunately for me—and you—I found a secret one happening at Dermstore this week. From now through Nov. 8, you can use coupon code SKINC15 at checkout to secure 15 percent off a bunch of the brand's best sellers, including the cream that made Stiefvater put off her Botox appointment.
Trust me, you won't see the brand marked down again for quite a while, so without further ado, here are five SkinCeuticals products worth snapping up before this private sale is over.
Want to know which buzzy products are *really* worth buying? Sign up for our shopping newsletter to uncover our favorite finds.
